title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 200g spaghetti, 2 large eggs, 50g Pecorino Romano cheese, 50g guanciale, Salt and pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Mix eggs, cheese, salt, and pepper. Cook guanciale until crispy. Toss cooked spaghetti in the pan with guanciale. Add egg mixture, toss well, and serve.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1 bell pepper, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, Soy sauce, Sesame oil, Rice vinegar
instructions: Stir-fry chicken. Add bell pepper, onion, and garlic. Season with soy sauce, sesame oil, and rice vinegar. Serve over rice.

title: Vegetarian Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Bell peppers, Onions, Olives, Mushrooms
instructions: Prepare pizza. Spread tomato sauce, cheese, and vegetables on dough. Bake until golden and bubbly.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup unsalted butter, 1/2 cup granulated sugar, 1 cup brown sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract, 2 large eggs, 2 cups chocolate chips
instructions: Preheat oven. Beat butter, sugars, and vanilla. Add eggs, one at a time. Bake until golden. Cool on wire racks.

title: Mango Smoothie
ingredients: 1 ripe mango, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup milk, Honey to taste, Ice cubes
instructions: Blend mango, yogurt, milk, and honey until smooth. Add ice cubes and blend until creamy. Serve.
